name: Wordle Game - share your score
description:
Share your daily wordle with your friends!

This template is optimized to share 2 images on Twitter.


After seeing so many people posting day after day the square emojis on Twitter, I decided to google what was happening and tried the game. I got instantly addicted!


I wanted to share my daily grid, but I really don't like to be filling in emojis on Twitter, and because I use several devices to play the game I was starting to last track of my overall score, so I created this file and decided to share with the community.


But what is wordle?

Here is the link, have fun!
